functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_esp_kerberos_auth_enabled
functions.description: Checks if ESP Kerberos authentication is enabled for HDInsight cluster.

functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_public_network_access_disabled_nsg_inbound_traffic_limited
functions.description: Checks if public network access is disabled and NSG inbound traffic is limited for HDInsight cluster.

functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_public_network_access_disabled
functions.description: Checks if public network access is disabled for HDInsight cluster.

functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_public_network_access_disabled_nsg_port_restriction
functions.description: Checks if public network access is disabled and NSG port restriction is applied for HDInsight cluster.

functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_esp_kerberos_enabled
functions.description: Checks if ESP Kerberos is enabled for HDInsight cluster.

functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_public_access_disabled_nsg_inbound_traffic_limited
functions.description: Checks if public access is disabled and NSG inbound traffic is limited for HDInsight cluster.

functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_esp_kerberos_auth_configured
functions.description: Checks if ESP Kerberos authentication is configured for HDInsight cluster.

functions.name: hdinsight_cluster_public_access_disabled_nsg_port_restriction
functions.description: Checks if public access is disabled and NSG port restriction is applied for HDInsight cluster.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Hdinsight API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
